generic.note: Starting gold is reduced from 625 to 600
Tangoes now come with 3 charges and cost 90 gold
Initial bounty rune now gives +40 gold to all heroes instead of 100 to the hero that picks it up
generic.info: Those bounty runes look slightly different

generic.note: Killing a neutral camp stack now gives a bonus 15% gold bounty to the hero that stacked it. No bonus is given if the stack is cleared by an enemy or the hero that stacked it.
generic.info: New audio is now played once a stack is successful. Stacked neutrals have a buff with the stacker's hero icon on it

generic.note: Tier 1 mid lane towers are now a bit closer to the river
Removed a tree in the radiant jungle
generic.info: To the top right of the blue crystals near the ancients

generic.note: Range creep attack acquisition range reduced from 800 to 600
